Module.Content:
<link href="http://wind-platform.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wind-platform/documentation/wiki_notes/note.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
 <script type="text/javascript" src="http://wind-platform.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wind-platform/documentation/wiki_notes/note.js"></script>
 <script>
 function startNote() {
 	var container = document.getElementById('noteContainer');
 	container.setAttribute("class", '__UP_type__');
 	gcNote('__UP_text__', '__UP_type__', container);
 }
 gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(startNote);
 </script>

 <div id="noteContainer" class=""/>
